artist: Artist: Attributed to Louis-Jean-François Lagrenée; Artist: Formerly attributed to Jacques Réattu
creditline:
The Richard Lewis Hillstrom Fund
John R. Van Derlip Fund (card cat.)
description: Verso full academic study of a male nude rendered in red chalk. No watermark seen.
medium: Pen and black ink, bistre wash, white gouache and graphite
title: Apollo, at the Behest of Zeus, Restoring Hector to Health and Exhorting Him to Engage the Greeks in Combat
